projects.title: Full-Stack Web Application
projects.description: Developed a full-stack client-server web application using React.js, Node.js, and Express.js. Implemented REST APIs, WebSockets for real-time communication, Sequelize ORM for database interaction, and conducted end-to-end testing with Cypress. CI/CD integration and deployment on Scalingo using GitLab pipelines.

projects.title: Obstacle-Avoiding Robot
projects.description: Led the development of a robot capable of avoiding obstacles using sensors and Arduino. Designed and assembled the hardware, programmed the behavior in C, and won a robotics competition at IUT Nantes.

projects.title: Cross-Platform Qt Application
projects.description: During my internship at LS2N, I ported a Windows application to a cross-platform version using C++ and Qt6. The project involved performance optimization and user interface enhancements.
